summary: The European Institute of Public Administration (EIPA) is a pivotal entity within the framework of European organisations, dedicated to enhancing the quality of public administration across EU member states. Established to foster cooperation and knowledge exchange, EIPA provides training, research, and consultancy services aimed at improving the effectiveness of public governance. It plays a crucial role in supporting EU institutions and national administrations by promoting best practices and facilitating the implementation of EU law and policies. Through its initiatives, EIPA contributes to the development of a more integrated and efficient public sector, aligning with the EU's regulatory objectives and enhancing administrative capacities.
